bibl.title: Old and New Worlds in Greek Onomastics
bibl.note: Paper deriving from the second Lexicon of Greek Personal Names colloquium, held at St Hilda's College, Oxford in March 2003. - Analyses names mentioned in I. Hermoupolis 4.
FRASER Peter M., The Ptolemaic Garrison of Hermoupolis Magna.
Elaine MATTHEWS (Ed.), Old and New Worlds in Greek Onomastics = Proceedings of the British Academy. 148 (Oxford, 2007) pp. 69-85, 1 fig.
